Welcome to Fleur plug-in’s documentation!¶

Framework for computational science

This plugin enables the use of the all-electron DFT code Fleur (http://www.flapw.de) with the AiiDA framework (http://www.aiida.net). The plugin is all in python, under the MIT license and is available under (https://github.com/broeder-j/aiida_fleur_plugin). It is developed at Forschungszentrum Juelich, (IAS-1/PGI-1), Germany.

Note

On these pages is the documentation of the plugin source code, some design description, usuage examples and tutorials of the plugin. For futher PGI-1 interal hints go to the Fleur website. Basic AiiDA workflows for Fleur are available on https://github.com/broeder-j/aiida_fleur_basewf .

If you use this plugin please cite:

  • for the plugin: (to come)
  • for fleur: http:/www.flapw.de

Requirements to use this code:¶

  • A running AiiDA version
  • Executables of the Fleur code

Other packages (in addition to all requirements of AiiDA):

  • lxml

Acknowledgments:¶

We acknowledge partial support from the EU Centre of Excellence “MaX – Materials Design at the Exascale” (http://www.max-centre.eu). (Horizon 2020 EINFRA-5, Grant No. 676598) We also thank the AiiDA team for their help.
